description: Personal trainer Adam and Cameron Kincade just finished a workout and it was time for round two of sweating it up, but in a whole different way. Still sweaty from the training, Adam kicks back on the bed while Cameron strips off his sneakers to massage his feet through his sport socks. Adam loves it. But he wants more! Before long Cameron has his socks off and starts licking his heels and sucking on his toes. Adam can't take much more of it before he pulls out his already rock hard cock and strokes it to a satisfying climax!
title: Personal Trainer Adam Gets His Big Feet Worshiped
